lexa.core.transform

Class Transform

  • java.lang.Object
    • lexa.core.transform.Transform
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    lexa.core.data.DataFactoryItem
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TransformStep

    public class Transform
extends java.lang.Object
implements lexa.core.data.DataFactoryItem
    Base Transformation

    This is the root item for all transformations

    Since:
    2017-02

      • factory

        Specified by:

        Returns:
        a data factory

      • getDataSet

        public lexa.core.data.DataSet getDataSet()
        Get the data set with the results of the transformation

        A call to this will always result in the transformation being completely processed.

        Returns:
        the results

      • item

        public lexa.core.data.DataItem item(int index)
        Get an item from the result set,

        The transform is processed only to the point where this item is available.

        Parameters:
        index - the index for the required item
        Returns:
        the required item

      • size

        public int size()
        Get the size of the result set.

        A call to this will always result in the transformation being completely processed.

        Returns:
        the size of the results

      • sourceUpdated

        protected void sourceUpdated()
        The source data has been updated.

        When the source data is updated this is called and cascades down through the transformations. It indicates that the transform must be reset.

      • contains

        public Transform contains(java.lang.String key,
                          java.lang.Object value)
        Create a transformation of contained items; equivalent to new Contains(this, key, value)
        Parameters:
        key - the key to an item in the source to be matched
        value - the value to match the key on.
        Returns:
        the transformation

        public Transform flatten(java.lang.String key)
        Create a transformation of flattened items; equivalent to new Flatten(this, key)
        Parameters:
        key - the key to an item in the source to be matched
        Returns:
        the transformation

      • sort

        public Transform sort(java.lang.String field,
                      boolean ascending)
        Create a transformation of sorted items; equivalent to new Group(this, field, ascending)
        Parameters:
        field - the field to sort on
        ascending - is the order ascending
        Returns:
        the transformation

      • sort

        public Transform sort(java.lang.String[] field,
                      boolean[] ascending)
        Create a transformation of sorted items; equivalent to new Group(this, field, ascending)
        Parameters:
        field - array of fields to sort on
        ascending - are the orders ascending
        Returns:
        the transformation

      • truncate

        public Transform truncate(int requiredSize)
        Create a transformation of truncated items; equivalent to new Group(this, requiredSize)
        Parameters:
        requiredSize - the size to truncate to; negative is tail.
        Returns:
        the transformation
